name: The Brookeside Group
tag_list: marketing, sales, crm, client-relationship-management, b2b, consulting
overview:
The Brookeside Group is a management consulting firm for business-to-business companies.

Brookeside provides strategic consulting services and relationship-building software tools to companies in a variety of industries, specifically manufacturing, retail, professional services, value-added resellers, insurance, financial services, pharmaceuticals and private equity, among others.

The company’s flagship product, Brookeside INSIGHT™, is a client relationship analytics software program that uncovers the variables that drive long-term client relationships, giving companies perspective into issues like client satisfaction, retention and defection. Brookeside’s consulting and training focuses on increasing revenue through growth strategies, sales force effectiveness, and account planning.

external_links.title: The Brookeside Group Adds New Features to Flagship Product INSIGHT
